amendment.description: To require a report on funding for State homes for veterans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3220 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3220 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Crapo to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3220 proposed by Senator Collins for Senator Crapo to Amendment SA 3411.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3220 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
